stories.text: Googling 'USPS tracking number' or 'UPS tracking number' places a widget on the search results page that allows you to directly enter a UPS or USPS tracking number. You think this is in good faith, when you could just spend 0.2 seconds to click the link right below the widget to go right to the official website to do it more directly? I bet Google scrapes the tracking number & uploads the tracking data directly to the Megacluster to further  train the Grid so it Can Serve You Better (TM)
stories.title: Google allows you to enter UPS or USPS tracking numbers directly through search
Should abuse survivors have to disappear from the internet? (2021)

stories.text:
I’d love to use Apple Notes to keep things simple, but I’m looking to use a notes app that shows all my incomplete tasks / to do checkboxes in one view. I’ve discovered that Dropbox Paper does this, but the app is otherwise pretty clunky and annoying, not to mention that files are saved in a proprietary format, which doesn’t seems ideal to me.

I just can’t figure out a good way to search for this, so hoping to tap some first hand knowledge here.
stories.title: What other note apps can show all incomplete tasks from any note in one view?

Hi! With ZITADEL we combine the best of Auth0 and Keycloak combined. Built for the serverless era. We worked the last couple of month on the V2 which is now ready for broader testing. We would love to get your feedback! Happy building.
